channel.title: First attempt
channel.description:
Ive messed about in photoshop before, done the odd sig before, but this was yr+ ago, so basically I came in with the approach of knowing the basics of photoshops workings. Bare in mind I suck at art, KS3 I had level 3 lel, didn't take it for KS4.
So I guess we can call it my first real attempt. I spent some time on it, but rushed it towards the end, the border sucks and that.. bleh jus take a look. No flame plz :). PS: I used 2 renders, can you spot them?
[img]http://img211.imageshack.us/img211/3042/redku6.png[/img]
EDIT: I spent a lil more time on the border and text:
[img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/5271/red2pu0.png[/img]

item.title: First attempt
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

yeh haha, border was 2 mins, fuck me that god damn tool is hard to use, text was 30seconds copied some gay tutorial that well didnt give an exactly… “awesome” effect[br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2007, 01:14:02 AM[/size][hr]Updated, redid border and text without any tuts, looks better now, but still aint the best
